channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Helix
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Helix

item.title: CVE-2022-47500|2024-08-03T14:55:08.395Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20helix
item.description:
URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in Apache Software Foundation Apache Helix UI component.This issue affects Apache Helix all releases from 0.8.0 to 1.0.4.
Solution: removed the the forward component since it was improper designed for UI embedding.
Â User please upgrade to 1.1.0 to fix this issue.
